conflicts.description: Different implementations identify different numbers of buyer group members
Different implementations assign different numbers of people to each role

accuracyIssues.description: Buyer group size 9 is not appropriate for Enterprise company (expected 12-18)
Only 60% of required roles are represented
Data quality score 75% is below acceptable threshold

recommendations.description: Implement adaptive buyer group sizing for Enterprise companies
recommendations.details: Current implementations use fixed sizing. Nike (75000 employees) needs 12-18 people, not fixed 8-15.

recommendations.description: Implement single source of truth for buyer group data
recommendations.details: 2 conflicts found between implementations. Need consolidated approach.

recommendations.description: Improve role coverage and data quality validation
recommendations.details: 2 quality issues found. Need better validation mechanisms.
